name: ent-academy-214
description: A web app to host videos which will be shown to users with a login. There will also be notifications sent to signed up users. This node application was built with Crowdbotics www.crowdbotics.com

COOKIE_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

SESSION_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of session.
